catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 501
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: woodblock printed book; text pages; image of figures outside of a building with activity inside; interior scene featuring women musicians entertaining men who are eating, with other women lining the room behind lanterns; figure standing and interacting, holding instruments; figures wearing giant heads
markings: Marks in pencil on pink label: [204 / V] ; inside URC: [V]; on back cover, ULC, in pencil: [2500] and other marks; Seal LRC of front page: [Settei]
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Encyclopedia of  Musical Theater Performances (Seikyoku ruisan 声曲類纂), vol. 6\
